creator: Nordea Bank Abp
descriptionHtml:
The app that helps you take care of your daily banking conveniently and easily.
We have updated the mobile bank, so you can get a better overview of your economy, and included new features.

Try it out, and see how handy it is.
1. Tap "Install" to download the app
2. Log in. Done!

With Nordea Mobile you can handle most of your daily banking, and it's always right at your fingertips.

Selected functions:
• Get a quick overview of your finances
• Quick and easy payments
• Block your card temporarily or permanently
• Use the app to contact Nordea via chat, phone or mail
• Book a meeting, join a pre-booked meeting, or have an instant online meeting
• All your savings and investments in one place
• Simple and convenient login

Want to know more about the advantages of the Mobile Bank? Need help to get started? Call us on 0200 70 000.
descriptionShort: Nordea bank services in your pocket

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- We have simplified some instructions to guide you even better.
- We have added a pre-login menu with new features that can be used without logging in.
- Want a sneak peek of the app? You can now see the demo customer before you log into our app. You can try it out without your personal information.
- The automatic log out time from inactivity will be changed from 15 minutes to 5 minutes.
- Bug fixes

• Simple and convenient login

descriptionShort: Nordea bank services in your pocket

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We have a new update ready for you. The latest release introduces new features such as: 

• The Overview tab where you can see all your finances in one place. Add, hide or rearrange sections and content to personalise your experience.
• The Insights tab where you can see your income and expenses at a glance. We have made it easy for you to track your spending with the app’s categorisation feature.  

Nordea Mobile Team

title: Nordea Mobile - Finland

creator: Nordea Bank Abp
descriptionHtml:
Nordea Mobile is a convenient way to access your finances on the go.

See how quick and easy Nordea Mobile is to use
1. Click “Install” to download the app.
2. Log in with the Nordea ID app or code calculator.

What can I do with Nordea Mobile?
• See all your finances in one place on the Overview tab. Add, hide or rearrange content to personalise your experience.
• Conveniently transfer money between your accounts or to a friend. 
• Quickly pay your physical invoices by scanning them with your camera. 
• Access your digital wallet – pay with Google Pay or Apple Pay. 
• Log in securely with the Nordea ID app, your biometrics or a password. The choice is yours.

Convenient access to your cards 
• If you forget your PIN for one of your cards, you can view it directly in the app.
• If you lose a card, you can block it temporarily or permanently. If you block the card permanently, you will automatically be sent a new card. 
You can minimise the risk of fraud by limiting the geographical areas where your credit card can be used and by restricting usage for online shopping. 

Deeper insight into your finances 
• On the Insights tab, you can see your income and expenses at a glance. Gain deeper insights by seeing where and how you spend your income with the app’s categorisation feature. 
• You can add products from other banks to the app so you have all your finances in one place. 

We are here for you 
At Nordea, we put our customers’ needs first. Contact us directly through the app via chat, by phone or by booking an online meeting with one of our advisers.

Our mobile banking app is designed with you in mind 
We continuously update the app based on your feedback to ensure you have the best experience possible. Leave us a review or send feedback directly through the app. We would love to hear your thoughts. 

Read more at nordea.fi/mobilebank

• If you lose a card, you can block it temporarily or permanently. If you block the card permanently, you will automatically be sent a new card. 
You can minimise the risk of fraud by limiting the geographical areas where your credit card can be used and by restricting usage for online shopping. 

Deeper insight into your finances 
• On the Insights tab, you can see your income and expenses at a glance. Gain deeper insights by seeing where and how you spend your income with the app’s categorisation feature. 
• You can add products from other banks to the app so you have all your finances in one place. 

We are here for you 
At Nordea, we put our customers’ needs first. Contact us directly through the app via chat, by phone or by booking an online meeting with one of our advisers.

Our mobile banking app is designed with you in mind 
We continuously update the app based on your feedback to ensure you have the best experience possible. Leave us a review or send feedback directly through the app. We would love to hear your thoughts. 

Read more at nordea.fi/mobilebank

title:
Nordea Mobile - Finland
4.20.2.4003053

creator: Nordea Bank Abp
descriptionHtml:
Bank in your pocket

The app puts the entire bank in the palm of your hand, enabling you to do most of your banking swiftly, smoothly and securely.

You can test the demo version of the app without logging in. You can access it through Menu before logging in. All information in the demo version is fictitious.

Examples of what you can do in the app:

YOUR OVERVIEW
In the Overview tab, you can view and manage all your finances in one place. You can add, hide or rearrange the order of your content to personalise your experience. Quick actions take you straight to several functions, such as Search, helping you find what you need. If you have other banks, you can also add them to get a better overview of your finances.

PAYMENTS AND TRANSFERS
Pay your bills and transfer money, both between your own accounts or to a friend. Here, you can also add and manage both e-invoices and direct debits, simplifying your everyday life.

MANAGE YOUR CARDS
Connect cards and wearables to Google Pay or Samsung Pay for contactless payments. If you forgot your PIN-code, you can view it here. You can also block your card if needed, and we’ll send you a new one automatically. Choose the geographic areas where your credit card can be used and by restricting use for online shopping so you can feel safer and better control of your payments.

SAVINGS AND INVESTMENTS
It’s easy to keep track of your savings and see how they are performing. Start saving monthly, trade in funds and stocks, or set a goal for your savings. Get suggestions and ideas for new investments through Find Investments.

DISCOVER NEW PRODUCTS AND SERVICES
In the Services tab, you can open different accounts, apply for credit cards or loans, get digital advice for long-term savings, and much more.

GET BETTER CONTROL OF YOUR FINANCES
The Insights tab gives you a clear overview of your income and expenditure. Your spending is divided into categories to give you a deeper understanding where your money is going. Here, you can make your own budgets to make it easier to plan and keep track of your expenditure.

WE'RE HERE FOR YOU
The Help tab contains all the information you need to get help with your banking. Use the Search function, see frequently asked questions and answers, or chat with us directly. If you call us through the app, you’ve already identified yourself, so we can help you faster.

We want to know what you think, so feel free to leave a review or send your feedback directly in the app. For more information, you’re welcome to contact us on 0200 70 000 (local rates apply) or visit nordea.fi/mobilebank.

Download the app today and get access to all the functions that simplify your banking!
descriptionShort: Nordea bank services in your pocket

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:

• New ‘Manage loan’ page where you can apply for changes on your loans.
• Receive alerts for card payments made in European Economic Area countries using a different currency.
• You can view your yearly financial insights on Insights tab.

We hope you like the new and improved updates!

Nordea Mobile Team
